text: Ate jadom unham upara ko'i bipata a'undi tam uha kahide ki he musa! Apane raba kola sade la'i aradasa karom. Jisa da usa ne tuhade nala ikarara kara rakhi'a hai. Jekara tusim sade uparom bipata hata devo tam asim zarura tuhade bharosa pragata karange ate tuhade nala izara'ila di satana nu jana de'ge
